oauthmodule.actions.custom

Class OauthSigninMultiIdP

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mendix.externalinterface.connector.RequestHandler
      • oauthmodule.actions.custom.OauthSigninMultiIdP

  • public class OauthSigninMultiIdP
extends com.mendix.externalinterface.connector.RequestHandler
    This class will handle the request as a requesthandler by redirecting the user to the selected Oauth provider. The provider is determined from the URI path parameters
    Since:
    2014-10-02
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Erwin 't Hoen
